verbs.description: Trump [V: has] asked the Justice Department to look into whether an FBI informant infiltrated his campaign for political purposes .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: asked] [ARG2: the Justice Department] [ARG1: to look into whether an FBI informant infiltrated his campaign for political purposes] .
Trump has asked [ARG0: the Justice Department] to [V: look] [ARG1: into whether an FBI informant infiltrated his campaign for political purposes] .
Trump has asked the Justice Department to look into whether [ARG0: an FBI informant] [V: infiltrated] [ARG1: his campaign] [ARGM-PRP: for political purposes] .
